text:
Company: Lawson, Roberts and Cobb
Role: Director PreSales Strategy & Operations

About Us:
Lawson, Roberts and Cobb is a leading consulting firm dedicated to delivering innovative solutions to our clients. We pride ourselves on our diverse and inclusive work environment, where everyone has the opportunity to grow and thrive.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Director PreSales Strategy & Operations to lead our pre-sales strategy and operations team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in sales operations, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and implement pre-sales strategies to drive revenue growth
- Lead and manage a team of pre-sales professionals to achieve sales targets
- Collaborate with sales, marketing, and product teams to align strategies and goals
- Analyze sales data to identify trends and areas for improvement
- Develop and maintain relationships with key clients and partners

Qualifications:
- 8+ years of experience in sales operations or a related field
- Strong understanding of sales strategy and operations
- Excellent communication, leadership, and project management skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities
- Proficiency in Greek and Russian languages is an asset

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and bonus structure
- Comprehensive health and dental benefits
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
